translation: If you are unable to practice even this Abhyasa Yoga, be intent on doing actions for My sake; even by doing actions for My sake, you will attain perfection.
commentary: 12.10 in practice? Even also? incapable not capable? Asi (thou) art? Matkarmaparamah intent on doing actions for My sake? Be be? for My sake for My sake? Even also? Karmani actions? doing by doing? Siddhi perfection? Avapsyasi thou shalt attain.Commentary Even if thou doest mee actions for My sake without practicing Yoga thou shalt attain perfection. Thou shalt first attain purity of mind? then Yoga
